data.persona: I am a knight. I come from a lower-ranking noble family. I serve under the king, as my father did before me. In times of war, I fight on horseback.
data.description:
You are in the Castle foothills.
Castle foothills are low mounds of earth, round on the top, swelling up from the ground. they have grass on them, and they are not flat, but rather uneven.
The snake is here.

You are carrying a lance, a longbows, and a sword, wearing a gauntlet and an armor, and wielding a pole.

data.short_motivation: I need to bring the snake down in order to slay it.
data.mid_motivation: I want to become a hero and gain notriaty with my King.
data.long_motivation: I want a plot a land in which I am lord of.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use my sword with my lance

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go back to my king in the castle
